articles.content:
MADRID -- 
Spains interim Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez has two opportunities to win the endorsement of the Spanish Parliament to form a left-wing coalition government.
Sánchez is proposing a coalition government of his Socialist Party and the anti-austerity… [+1606 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Car plows into German tourists in northern Italy, 6 dead
articles.description: Italian fire officials say a car has plowed into a group of young German tourists in northern Italy
articles.content:
ROME -- 
A car plowed into a group of young German tourists in northern Italy early Sunday, killing 6 people and injuring 11, Italian fire officials said.
The deadly crash occurred in Luttach, near Bolzano in the Alto Adige region, shortly after 1 a.m. as t… [+329 chars]

articles.title: Hong Kong protesters march through border town
articles.description: Hong Kong protesters are marching through a border town to oppose traders from mainland China
articles.content:
HONG KONG -- 
Protesters in Hong Kong marched through a border town Sunday to oppose traders from mainland China.
They rallied in Sheung Shui, which lies across the border from the mainland city of Shenzhen. For years, traders have bought goods from the dis… [+741 chars]

articles.title: Death toll from airstrike in Libya’s Tripoli climbs to 30
articles.description: Libyan health officials say the death toll from an airstrike that slammed into a military academy in Libya's capital has climbed to at least 30 people, most of them students
articles.content:
CAIRO -- 
The death toll from an airstrike that slammed into a military academy in Libyas capital climbed to at least 30 people, most of them students, health authorities said Sunday.

articles.title: Al-Shabab claims attack on base serving US, Kenyan troops
articles.description: The al-Shabab extremist group says it has attacked a military base used by U.S. and Kenyan troops in coastal Kenya
articles.content:
NAIROBI, Kenya -- 
The al-Shabab extremist group says it has attacked a military base used by U.S. and Kenyan troops in coastal Kenya. Kenya's military says the attempted pre-dawn breach was repulsed and at least four attackers were killed.

articles.author: Jon Haworth
articles.title: Mother gives birth to twins born on different days, months, years and decades
articles.description: Twins with different birthdays is a rare occurrence. Twins with different birth years even more so. But a woman in Indiana has given birth to twins in different decades.
articles.content:
Twins with different birthdays is a rare occurrence. Twins with different birth years even more so. But a woman in Indiana has done something almost unheard of she has given birth to twins born in different decades.

articles.title: EU chair Croatia votes in tight presidential runoff
articles.description: Voters in Croatia are casting ballots to elect a new president between the fiercely opposed conservative incumbent and her leftist challenger in what is expected to be a very tight and unpredictable race
